wikipedia_page.main: John Patrick Somers (1791–1862) was an Irish Liberal, Repeal Association and Whig politician.

response: John Somers, 1st Baron Somers (1651–1716) was an English Whig jurist and statesman.
John Somers may also refer to:
*John Somers (motorcycle racer) in 1963 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season
*John Somers (sport shooter) (1874–1942), represented Great Britain at the 1912 Summer Olympics
